key.name: show-notifications
key.description: Normally we show a notification each time the user changes the touchpad status. It is a bit slow, so maybe you prefer not to enable it.

key.name: enable-on-login
key.description: If you set this to on, the touchpad will be enabled at each login. Otherwise, the last status is remembered. Switching this to false can be dangerous if your only pointing device is the touchpad!

key.name: use-color-icons
key.description: If you set this to on, the icons used by the extension will have color accents. By default, the icons used blend better with GNOME panel style.
